channel.title: Source problelm
channel.description:
Hey, this happens suddenly .... the server just gets nulled or something like....if i say "hi" it would keep saying and saying till i restart srver or if i hit someone itll keep repeating it...it'll keep repeating everything untill i restart server...
help?
thanks

item.title: Source problelm
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

That’s a glitch in all Dodian sources, I’m unaware of any fixes for it.

Read full topic
